forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. North northeast wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 74. Northeast wind around 7 mph.
